Assigning Promotion Groups

You can assign a promotion group to revisions by selecting a revision, a single versioned file, multiple versioned files, a project, a folder, or a project database.

Using the System Default Options

Unless your Administrator changed the defaults for the project's configuration, when you assign a promotion group to a versioned file, Version Manager:

  • Assigns the first development group to the item selected.
  • Assigns the promotion group to the default revision.
  • Prompts you to change the promotion group if one has already been assigned.
  • Does not assign the promotion group to files in subprojects.

To assign a promotion group:

  1. Select the item you want to promote.

  2. Select Actions | Promotion Group | Assign. The Assign Promotion Group dialog box appears.

  3. Accept the defaults listed above and click OK, or do the following:

    1. To override the defaults on the General tab, edit any of the fields described below:

      To... Do this...
      Choose the promotion group that will be assigned to the item Select a promotion group from the Assign Promotion Group list box.
      Choose the revision to which the promotion group will be assigned Enter a new revision number, version label, or promotion group in the To Revision field or use the browse button to select a it.
      Select an action to occur if a promotion group has already been assigned to the item In the If promotion group exists drop-down menu, select one of the following options.
      Prompt to prompt for confirmation before assigning the promotion group
      Reassign to assign the promotion group without being prompted
      Don't reassign to prevent the promotion group from being assigned
      Assign the promotion group to all items in subprojects Select the Include files in subprojects check box.


    2. To review the selected files:

      To... Do this...
      View the items selected for promotion Click the Selected Files tab.
      View the properties of an item Select the versioned file and click the Properties button.


  4. Click OK. The promotion group is assigned to the selected files.
